channel.title: mycatalog updates
channel.description: 'My Catalog' uses the IBM Cloud catalog API to retrieve data from the catalog. It attempts to be as accurate as possible. This feed shows additions, updates, removals from the catalog. Use with care. It is a work-in-progress :)

item.title: [removed] Citrix DaaS for IBM Cloud (citrix-virtual-app-desktop)
item.description: Create a Citrix DaaS environment on IBM Cloud.

item.title: [updated] Secure Automated Backup with Compass (compass) has a new plan named compass-shared-consumption-pricing
item.description: Priced per gigabyte hour per copy

item.title: [updated] Qiskit Runtime (quantum-computing) has changed the description of the plan named paygo-standard
item.description:
*before*: **Systems** Four systems, three 127 qubit Eagle processor and one 27 qubit Falcon processor. Time limits = program-specific up to 8 hours. Qiskit Runtime Second = time counted to process a job. No charge for job queue time.
**Simulators** Five simulators (QASM, statevector, mps, stabilizer, and extended stabilizer). Time limits = program-specific up to 3 hours.
**Performance management strategies** Two strategies: • IBM 3 resilience levels. • Q-CTRL AI-driven automated error reduction. **No additional cost**., *after*: **Systems** Four 127 qubit Eagle processor. Time limits = program-specific up to 8 hours. Qiskit Runtime Second = time counted to process a job. No charge for job queue time.
**Simulators** Five simulators (QASM, statevector, mps, stabilizer, and extended stabilizer). Time limits = program-specific up to 3 hours.
**Performance management strategies** Two strategies: • IBM 3 resilience levels. • Q-CTRL AI-driven automated error reduction. **No additional cost**.
